content: Hey numbers, Start by going to an offical Army site that you can use their search engine, US Army and eventually you can get to lineages of specific divisions, the specific brigades and so forth until you get to unit lineage you desire, start a division level and work backwards. I'll post a good hot link if you would like? Robert
